content.html: All games should have a Main Menu item called "Relearn Controls" and it's just a 2 min tutorial. If you haven't played the game in over 2 months, it also asks you if you want to play the Relearn Controls tutorial before you start. Will try to add this to our next game.
content.value:
All games should have a Main Menu item called "Relearn Controls" and it's just a 2 min tutorial. If you haven't played the game in over 2 months, it also asks you if you want to play the Relearn Controls tutorial before you start.

Will try to add this to our next game.
